## Source: ossf-package-analysis (f92a03425cd97c753a2412a2f070a5844bfef3fb64534fe79fc37dec3dda5e28)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'ethers-5' @ 5.0.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
